title: Will be there section change for those moving from 1sem to 2 sem

comments.body: Most probably yeah. Everyone will be ordered branch and srn wise

Go to pesuacademy website. On the login page you'll find an option below the text boxes to check 'Class and section' info. Click on that and enter your srn or mobile number and you'll get your section info
Well there's always a small probability of that happening
Sections are changed right? They sent list anol also no?
